com.slickqa.client.apiparts

Interface FilesApi

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    FilesApiPart

    public interface FilesApi
    Api defining retrieving, updating and Deleting the files in slick. Also look at FilesQueryApi.
    Author:
    Created by Jason Corbett on 4/17/14.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      StoredFile addChunk(byte[] data)
      Add a "chunk" of data to a stored file.
      StoredFile get()
      Retrieve a specific stored file (not the content) based on the id.
      StoredFile update(StoredFile storedFile)
      Update the metadata of a stored file in slick.

    • Method Detail

      • get

        StoredFile get()
               throws SlickError
        Retrieve a specific stored file (not the content) based on the id.
        Returns:
        The stored file from slick.
        Throws:
        SlickError - if an error occurs talking to slick.

      • addChunk

        StoredFile addChunk(byte[] data)
                    throws SlickError
        Add a "chunk" of data to a stored file. This will cause slick to update the length of the file. The size of the chunk of data to upload is important. You should use the default chunk size (which will be set when the stored file was created). It will almost always be 262144 in length. The only reason to upload a chunk of a different size is if this is the last chunk, and there isn't that much data left to upload.
        Parameters:
        data - The "chunk" of data to upload
        Returns:
        The uploaded StoredFile
        Throws:
        SlickError - if an error occurs talking to slick.

      • update

        StoredFile update(StoredFile storedFile)
                  throws SlickError
        Update the metadata of a stored file in slick. Warning, use this with caution. You should not change the chunk size, or the id. The length of the file will be set when you add chunks to the file. The only thing you should update is the mime type, the name, or the md5sum.
        Parameters:
        storedFile - The updates to the stored file.
        Returns:
        The updated stored file from slick.
        Throws:
        SlickError - if an error occurs talking to slick.
